attributes.review: I expected this to be terrible and my expectations were met. I have never seen such an app. I was promised freedom and peace once I signed up but did not get any. I am tired of people not caring for the greater good of their consumers. Seems like it could use a few changes.
attributes.title: This app doesn’t deserve my energy or time

attributes.review:
This app was just like the president and made in his image, which I thought was amazing until I realized that he is racist, sexist, and a disgusting being not worthy to be called a human. The app itself does not work! Whenever I open the app it spews nothing but racist slurs at top volume :( 
I expected better from a man with an IQ of 70.
attributes.title: Terrible :((

attributes.review: This app hardly FUNCTIONS. Every time I try to open it to read news from our RULER it CRASHES. Sad. I’ve never had such a horrible experience with any app ever, and I used to play SUBWAY SURFERS. Please do not download this APP!1 If you worship the almighty POTUS Donald Jesus Trump like I do then don’t download this app because he wouldn’t want you TOO!!!!111!!! 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: Worst app... Maybe EVER

attributes.review: So one day I got the app to support our amazing cheeto child predator president 💥💥🤩🙈 and to see the amazing plans he has for our dearest nation <33 THEN, as soon as I got the app my phone set of an alarm saying I died 😦😰Trump then appeared on my screen smiling saying I did great, ticked me thru my screen and then sent me to the afterlife 🤯So ya don’t download 🤗😓😡
attributes.title: “I DIED BC OF THIS APP 😰😰?!???!!” (story time)

attributes.review: This app not only holds disgusting awful content it also makes my phone crash every 10 seconds and honestly probably going to give me a virus. There is no useful information in this app at all. All it is is political jargon and disgusting awful attacks on other people.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: This was such a terrible app when I opened it it seemed to be running properly but after a few minutes it made my screen unresponsive and I had to restart my phone and wait an hour just so my screen could respond
attributes.title: Froze my phone

attributes.review: I got this app to actually learn about trump but it just would crash every time I opened it. Also it crashed other apps and when I restarted my phone it wouldn’t turn back on and I had to take it to the apple store. This is a horrible app, I believe to be unfixable
attributes.title: Complete trash

attributes.review: Needs to be put out there that I couldn’t use my phone for a whole day after I first opened this app. It was a huge battery drain and my phone crashed every time I unlocked it before I could get off the app. Would not recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible Bugs

attributes.review: Imagine feeling so insecure that you feel the need to delete an app where others are actually making positive change for America while you sit there in your bunker and do nothing. Also, I took a look at this app and it’s actually the worst thing I’ve ever seen
attributes.title: No :)

attributes.userName: not a person from tik tok
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app to support our wonderful president trafficker, but this app literally took a week to download. When it finally downloaded it completely wiped my phone once I opened it. I don’t suggest getting it unless you want to redownload tik tok along with your other apps.
